protocol.name: P-GSE20009-10
protocol.text: Values are unmodified outputs from Bioconductor/just.gcrma and represent the log2 transformation of the signal level.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-2
protocol.text: Phenanthrene was thoroughly mixed into sterile media prior to pouring plates.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-3
protocol.text: 21d whole plants grown from sterilized seeds on 0.5MS + phytoagar, long-day light, 23C +/- 1C.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-4
protocol.text: RNA was isolated using TRIzol (Molecular Research Center) per the manufacturer's instructions, DNAse treated (Invitrogen), and purified with RNeasy Mini Cleanup (Qiagen) per the manufacturers' instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-5
protocol.text: Labeling was performed with the Affymetrix Enzo kit per the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-6
protocol.text: Chips were hybridized and processed on a Affymetrix Fluidics Station Model 450 per the manufacturer's instructions.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-7
protocol.text: Hybridized chips were read on a model M10 scanner.

protocol.name: P-GSE20009-8
protocol.text: .CEL files were produced by the Affymetrix MAS, and normalization was performed in R/Bioconductor using the just.gcrma function with default parameters.
